short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The beautifully customizable New Tab Page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Frost is a modern New Tab Extension with a focus on great design and next-level productivity. It aims to strike a good balance between ease of use and customization. It is also free with no ads or data collection.

Let's explore some of its features!

❄ Custom Search Engines
Search on Spotify, YouTube, and many other sites of your choice right from Frost using it's powerful custom search feature!

❄ Shortcuts
Quickly access your favourite sites with beautiful shortcuts. Frost's popup let's you add a shortcut to the current page in a couple of clicks!

❄ Meaningful Customization
Make Frost your own with just a few controls! Customizing it is fun and is designed to not feel repetitive. You can preview your changes in real time.

❄ Zero-Clutter
There are no persistent buttons or branding cluttering up your start page. The only visible elements are the search bar and your shortcuts!

❄ Privacy
Any data (like shortcuts and search queries) is only handled within your browser. I believe this is a necessary foundational value for a New Tab Extension.

And a lot more!
- Set wallpapers from your computer or the web.
- Backup and restore your settings, or share them with others.
- Built-in, adjustable image optimization for the wallpaper.
- Highly flexible layout that fits a variety of screen sizes.
- Excellent keyboard support.

Ideas and suggestions are always welcome! Also, if you find any issues or bugs, please do report them so that they can be fixed! You can send me an email at danielfernandescws+frost@gmail.com or use the Google Form below.
- Contact Form: https://forms.gle/bitFWj9bS5yWkDFE8

Thank you for using Frost!
